name: src/ccwc-video.es6
CCWCVideo
description:
CCWCVideo supports both video files and camera feeds
Blit your video to a canvas, get frame data, scale the frame/canvas output, and render video to an external canvas of your choosing

name: frameDataMode
description: what type of data comes back with frame data event

name: useCanvasForDisplay
description: determines whether to use the canvas element for display instead of the video element

name: canvasRefreshInterval
description: refresh interval when using the canvas for display

name: tick
description: interval timer to draw frame redraws

name: letterBoxLeft
description: left offset for letterbox of video

name: letterBoxTop
description: top offset for letterbox of video

name: canvasScale
description:
render scale for canvas frame data
best used when grabbing frame data at a different size than the shown video

name: canvasContext
description: get canvas context for drawing into it

name: canvasContext
description: get canvas context for drawing into it

name: getCurrentFrameData
description: get image data for current frame

params.name: noredraw
params.description: do not perform redraw (can be wasteful)
